en-US.headertext:
Congratulations, and welcome onboard!
We are excited that you are joining us and we have prepared for you some useful information before Day 1. Fasten your seatbelt and let the journey begin!

nextstepstext1.headline: First day
nextstepstext1.text: As a new member of team you will initially be introduced to your new colleagues by your manager. Your manager will also help you understand our processes and systems to get started. You can already now start to familiarize yourself by opening up the New Hire Curriculum below.

res1.text: Read more about is on our Company website

res3.text: Fill out form - Personal Contact Details

res4.text: Update your Bio page in Universal Profile

nextstepstext2.headline: First week
nextstepstext2.text: Being new at the job can be stressfull, we want you to clearly understand the expectations of the job as well as the company culture. We believe it will help you and your performance. You manager and/or mentor will support you in getting up to speed.

res2.text: Be recommended training for your role

res3.text: Create your own playlist together with your manager

nextstepstext3.headline: First month
nextstepstext3.text: By spending time together with your manager and/or mentor you will shortly be able to set valuable goals supporting our company vision/strategy. We will also be having a social get together for all new hires where you will be able to connect with the entire team!

res1.text: Schedule regular check-in meetings with your manager

nextstepstext4.headline: First 6 months
nextstepstext4.text: When you succeed - we succeed! We're a group. We're a team. From the CEO  and on through, we're a team. We win together, we lose together. We celebrate and we mourn together. And defeats are softened and victories sweeter because we did them together. At the end of the day - staying healthy and motivated is key for us all.
